creditline: Gift of James C. and Kathryn L. Hogan
description: white card printed in black; snowy landscape with man with tall stick wearing hat with a very long, tall feather and a boy wearing fuzzy mittens and cap pulling a sled; tree with many tiny bare branches at left; printed inside:  "With many good wishes for Christmas and the new year"
object_name: Christmas card with man with hat with tall feather and boy with sled
provenance: The artist; his stepson, Jim Hogan, Hudson, WI.
title: Christmas card with man with hat with tall feather and boy with sled
